title: The Great War Quiz
description: This is a quick and simple quiz about world war one. The first ever war.

questions.text: Why did the chicken cross the road?
options: To get to the other side?
To die and go to heaven?
To sniff a cat made of jam?
A duke shot an ostrich cause he was hungry
The vile hun and their vast empire
It was easier than not having a war
